name: StringTransform
desc: Constants representing an ICU string transform.

items.name: static let toLatin: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from any script to Latin script.

items.name: static let latinToArabic: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Arabic script.

items.name: static let latinToCyrillic: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Cyrillic script.

items.name: static let latinToGreek: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Greek script.

items.name: static let latinToHangul: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Hangul script.

items.name: static let latinToHebrew: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Hebrew script.

items.name: static let latinToHiragana: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Hiragana script.

items.name: static let latinToKatakana: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Katakana script.

items.name: static let latinToThai: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Latin script to Thai script.

items.name: static let hiraganaToKatakana: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Hiragana script to Katakana script.

items.name: static let mandarinToLatin: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transliteration of a string from Han script to Latin.

items.name: static let stripDiacritics: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transformation of a string by removing diacritics.

items.name: static let stripCombiningMarks: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transformation of a string by removing combining marks.

items.name: static let fullwidthToHalfwidth: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transformation of a string from full-width CJK characters to half-width forms.

items.name: static let toUnicodeName: StringTransform
items.desc: An identifier for a transform that converts characters to Unicode names.

items.name: static let toXMLHex: StringTransform
items.desc: A constant containing the transformation of a string from characters to XML hexadecimal escape codes.
